name: Fix icons using the Oxygen icon theme (or others)
description: Currently Firefox uses gtk specific iconsfor many of its buttons and menus, but these do not exist in the Oxygen icon theme (and many others). This style replaces them with names agnostic to the environment, that do exist in Oxygen and other themes.
additional_info:
The native tabs are not part of the theme. These were achieved by going to about:config, setting browser.tabs.onTop to false and by installing the GTK+ Native theme. Updates
  • Added icons for dialog buttons, context menus and Add-ons Manager
